MESSAGE: Answer only in numbers (unless you are setting text!) or you'll never lose.

QUESTION: what number of HP do you want KRIS to have?
What number of HP do you want SUSIE to have?
What number of HP do you want ralsei to have?
What background would you like? 1: castle layout 2: normal layout 3: Jevil Layout
What number of Hp do you want your enemy to have? (ONLY NUMBERS and it can't be zero or else it won't work)
Do you want Susie to always attack? (1 if yes, 2 if no)
What number of damage do you want the enemy to deal (it has to be a negative number. Ex. -10)
set your act text! Ex: You convinced the enemy not to fight. it was utterly swayed.
Do you want to make the enemy able to be spared after the act? (answ: 1 if yes, 0, if no).

MESSAGE: To set menu text, press the button:see inside and look for the sprite, menutext. There, you can set your text. However, it can't be long. (press space to progress)
To set monster text, go to the monster sprite! (press space to progress!)
(press space to progress through the next message!)
If you want to change what SUSIE says when she eats an item, go to sprite:susie.
NOTE: You can upload your own music and change the sprites too!
If you want to check out your battle, click on the green flag!
To set attacks, go to the attack manager. It's a sprite. (press space to progress)
